code: import{useEffect,useState,useContext}from'react';import api from'../utils/api';import{AuthContext}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Orders(){const{token}=useContext(AuthContext);const[orders,setOrders]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchOrders=async()=>{try{const res=await api.get('/orders/my',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setOrders(res.data);}catch(err){console.error(err);alert('Failed to load orders');}};fetchOrders();},[token]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-3xl mx-auto mt-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"My Orders"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-2",children:orders.map(order=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border p-3 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Product ID: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-mono",children:order.productId})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Type: ",order.productType]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Status: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-semibold",children:order.status})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Created: ",new Date(order.createdAt).toLocaleString()]})]},order._id))})]});}
